verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: are] meeting for the first time this week in Singapore . A major retail conference will be hosted at the same time in a nearby hotel and resort , the Marina Bay Sands . Kim paid a visit to the Marina Bay Sands on Monday .
